review: I do like this product, but there is more to learn about it.  I picked it up during a special promotion by Amazon and I watched some Netflix as well as some cooking channels on it.  I do not pay for cable TV, so this product along with my computer and digital TV antenna is all that I need to watch programs, documentaries and movies.
